TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定义由承载工作流设计器和编译器的环境实现以在验证和编译过程中提供特定于环境的编译信息的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface implemented by the environment hosting the workflow designer and compiler to provide environment-specific compilation information during the validation and compilation processes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckTypes As Boolean
public: property bool CheckTypes { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示是否检查类型的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether types are checked.

value.span: 如果检查类型，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在工作流编译的验证阶段，工作流源文档将被拒绝如果属性是`true`和工作流或伴随规则文件直接引用的列表不存在任何.NET Framework 类型授权的类型。During the validation phase of workflow compilation, a workflow source document is rejected if the property is `true` and the workflow or the companion rules file directly references any .NET Framework types not present on a list of authorized types. 授权的类型列表是一个 XML 文档，其中每个条目指示`Assembly`、 `Namespace`、 `TypeName`，和`Authorized`{`true`或`false`} 指示器。The list of authorized types is an XML document where each entry indicates an `Assembly`, a `Namespace`, a `TypeName`, and an `Authorized` {`true` or `false`} indicator. 此类与列表上的一项对应。This class corresponds to an entry on the list. 另外请注意，允许指定通配符以包括或排除完整的命名空间。Also note that wildcard character designations are allowed, to include or exclude complete namespaces. 例如，使用`Type="System.*"`包括中的所有类型，包括子命名空间中包含的类型。For example, using `Type="System.*"` includes all types in , including types contained in child namespaces. 授权的类型列表的使用受选项 **/checktypes**或通过使用属性。The use of a list of authorized types is controlled by the option **/checktypes** or by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Language As String
public: property System::String ^ Language { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在编译工作流时环境使用的编程语言，例如 Visual Studio。

span.span: Gets the programming language used by the environment, such as Visual Studio, when compiling the workflow.

value.span: 开发环境使用的编程语言的名称。

span.span: The name of the programming language used by the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Language` 属性的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the `Language` property. 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#123](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#123)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#123](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#123)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RootNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ RootNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为此项目设置的根命名空间。

span.span: Gets the root namespace set for the project.
The name of the root namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在 Visual Basic 编译环境中用于将项目的根命名空间传递到编译器。This property is used in Visual Basic compilation environment to pass the root namespace of the project to the compiler. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `RootNamespace` 属性的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the `RootNamespace` property. 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). [!code-csharp[Wf_samples#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#122)]
